name: Cubesicles
description:
Description
Cubesicles is a simple puzzle game where you locate around obstacles such as walls and make it to the end of the level all whilst avoiding the Enemies. It Includes many features such as fireable cannons, pushable buttons and moving enemies. And best of all, It's entirely free.

Controls

  • Moving: WASD or Arrow Keys
  • Camera Change: "C"
  • Exit Cannon: "Space"
  • Restart: "R"
  • Pause: Escape/Esc
  • Quick Quit: Alt+F4
